title: Money: Costs & Fares (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Costs & Fares subcategory within Money. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: It costs about 10,000 yen for a bullet train from Tokyo to Niigata.
cards.romaji: Tokyo kara Nigata made, shinkansen de daitai ichi-man-en desu.
cards.japanese: 東京から新潟まで、新幹線でだいたい一万円です。
